column4: I did port forwarding to the specified box, but it's not working for my friends
yeah, I have the ports from 20-21 forwarded
I checked that over a couple times
it's something included with the linux distribution I have on the other boxc
it works from my internal network
it also helps if you could give the errors the people get when trying to connect
I thought FileZilla is merely a client?
do you have a passive range open?
I would use vsftpd instead of pure ftpd
bean, thanks for being patient with an idiot
